com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Unit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alien, Weapon

    public abstract class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actor
    Abstract superclass inherited by Weapon and Alien subclasses.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Unit

        Unit(java.lang.String name,
     double speed,
     double damage,
     double rateOfFire,
     double health,
     double range,
     double chanceToHit,
     int x,
     int y,
     int width,
     int height)
        Construct a new Unit with given name, speed, damage, rateOfFile, health, range, x co-ordinate, y co-ordinate, width and height
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Unit
        speed - The speed of the Unit
        damage - The damage the Unit inflicts
        rateOfFire - The rate of fire of the Unit
        health - The health of the Unit
        range - The range of the Unit
        chanceToHit - The chance of the Weapon to score a hit
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Unit
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Unit
        width - The width of the Unit
        height - The height of the Unit
